dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eldoria is plagued by darkness and destruction.

dialogues.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogues.text: I've been searching for a way to restore the ancient magic for years. I won't give up now.

dialogues.speaker: Arin the Bold
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of a hidden temple deep within the forest, where the secrets of the past lie waiting. Will you join me on this quest, Eira?
